274  /* Sets the head, left and right variable lists (conditional distribution).
275 
276  @param[in] left_vars Left variables. Must not be empty.
277  @param[in] right_vars Right variables. Must not be empty.
278  */
279  void set_variables(const kplVariableList &left_vars,
280  const kplVariableList &right_vars);
281 
282  /* Sets the head, left and right variable lists (conditional distribution).
283 
284  @param[in] left_vars Left variables. Must not be empty.
285  @param[in] right_vars Right variables. Must not be empty.
286  */
287  void set_variables(plVariablesConjunction const & left_vars,
288  plVariablesConjunction const & right_vars) {
289  set_variables(left_vars.get_variable_list(), right_vars.get_variable_list());
290  }
291  void set_variables(plVariablesConjunction const & left_vars,
292  kplVariableList const & right_vars) {
293  set_variables(left_vars.get_variable_list(), right_vars);
294  }
295  void set_variables(kplVariableList const & left_vars,
296  plVariablesConjunction const & right_vars) {
297  set_variables(left_vars, right_vars.get_variable_list());
298  }
299 
300  /* Sets the head, left and right variable lists. Assumes that the list of
301  right variables is empty (non-conditional distribution).
302 
303  @param[in] left_vars Left variables. Must not be empty.
304  */
305  void set_variables(const kplVariableList &left_vars);
306 
307  /* Sets the head, left and right variable lists. Assumes that the list of
308  right variables is empty (non-conditional distribution).
309 
310  @param[in] left_vars Left variables. Must not be empty.
311  */
312  void set_variables(plVariablesConjunction const & left_vars) {
313  set_variables(left_vars.get_variable_list());
314  }
